2. The annualized returns will only be presented for funds that have investment track records of not less than 1 year; and the cumulative returns will only be presented for funds that have investment track records of not less than 6 months.

3. Some pieces of information, such as Fund Expense Ratio, are historical in that they are based on data from the previous financial period. The figures will not reflect any increases or decreases in fees, charges or expenses in the current financial period.

4. Direct comparison of the performance between constituent funds for guaranteed funds, uncategorized equity fund, uncategorized bond fund or uncategorized mixed assets fund may not be meaningful as the constituent funds may not have similar features.

5. The fund objectives of some funds have been changed, comparison of performance between them and other constituent funds under the same fund category may not be meaningful. Its return may include the return for the period before change of fund objectives.
